name: European Federation of Intelligent Energy Efficiency Services
membership:
The Coalition for Energy Savings, E3PO
Informal alliances/coalitions: the Heat Coalition, Energy Efficiency Industrial Forum
goal: EFIEES' purpose is to promote activities of private Energy Efficiency Services Companies (EESCs) in the European Union. These companies design and implement practical measures to improve energy efficiency of their customers by the means of energy-efficiency services contracts. Their objective is to optimise the energy management of end-users.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Internal Market
euInitiatives: EU legislative activities and policies regarding energy and climate issues, in particular: energy efficiency, GHG emissions, EU ETS, cogeneration as well as subjects such as taxation, public procurement and concessions. Examples of files: the Energy Efficiency Directive, the EU ETS Directive, 2030 Climate and Energy Framework, Directives on Concessions and Public Procurement.
